A collection of updates, improvements, and bug fixes which are available in the latest version." created: 2024-08-09 updated: 2024-08-09 layout: blog publish: true --- ![743mCiUx1XltiG_wiw-pc4lL7-T8Y051jvpuEKQRxrI=](/blobs/743mCiUx1XltiG_wiw-pc4lL7-T8Y051jvpuEKQRxrI=) # AFFiNE 0.16 Release Notes: Boost Your Organization and Workflow ## **Get ready to organize, multitask, and enhance your creativity with the all-new AFFiNE 0.16 update!** ### **1. Unleash the Power of Organization:** * **Folders:** Introducing a brand new "Organize" section in the sidebar! Now, manage your frequently used documents with ease. Create folders, drag and drop content for a hierarchical structure, and keep everything neatly categorized. * **Favorites Revamp:** All favorite documents are now displayed individually, making them easily accessible. Perfect for quick access by co-editors. ### ### **2. Multi-Tab Magic:** * **Multi-tab Support:** Juggle multiple projects effortlessly with our new tab system. Switch between documents seamlessly, regardless of Edgeless or Page view, for a more efficient workflow. ### **3. Capture AI Conversations:** * **AI Chat Block:** Record your AI interactions for future reference! Save AI chat conversations directly to the whiteboard, preserving the state of the dialogue for later use or continuation. * For a full introduction and breakdown check out the in-depth guide here: ### **4. Unleash Your Artistic Flair:** * **Edgeless Color Picker:** Personalize your notes with a vibrant palette! The color picker allows customization of Notes, Connectors, Shapes, and Pen settings, both in light and dark mode. ### **5. Enhanced List Management:** * **Nesting Capabilities:** Take control of your lists! This update empowers you to nest various block types within Bulleted Lists, Numbered Lists, and To-do Lists. And the drag and drop functionality simplifies organization. * **Flexible Numbered Lists:** Start your numbered list anywhere! Now you can begin with any number you choose, like 5, for a more customized approach. ### **6. Navigate with Ease:** * **External Table of Contents (TOC):** Hover over the document to reveal a quick TOC on the right side. This feature allows for effortless navigation and jumping to specific sections within your document. * **Title Dimension:** Quickly return to the top of your document with a single click on the Title dimension present in the TOC. ### **7. Streamlined Document Management:** * **Unified Doc Info Entry:** Access doc info from a central location! The update offers quick access to document properties through the top bar, regardless of the viewing mode (Pages or Edgeless). ### **8. Performance and Bug Fixes:** * **Faster Database and File Sync:** Experience a significant improvement in database and file syncing speeds. * **Improved Search:** Find what you need faster with a more accurate search function. * **Enhanced Copy & Paste:** Effortlessly handle super-long text with improved copy and paste functionality. * **Center Peek for Database:** Now you can center peek within the database for better viewing. * **Drag Handle Support:** Drag handles are now available in the database for easier management. ### **9. A Glimpse into the Future:** * **Mobile and Database Enhancements:** We're committed to continuous improvement! Get a sneak peek at the upcoming features we're developing for mobile and database functionality. * As we progress with mobile development we've initially added improved multi-touch, stylus and pen support. It is a work in progress but you can check the progress out on [insider.affine.pro](https://insider.affine.pro) * In regards to Databases there are some major updates coming. With support for more data sources, real-time linked databases, databases with notes, also database formulas and queries with computation abilities. ### 10. The One-Off Plan You asked and asked, now after much thought and consideration we've finalized on the plan's features and [pricing](https://affine.pro/pricing). This will be rolling out soon so keep an eye out for the new one-off plan. This plan boasts 1TB of storage for a one-off payment, offering life-time personal usage. Perfect for our most beloved supporters. **Excited to explore AFFiNE?** Try AFFiNE today and get started for free.
